Sentencas: A number of doped lanthanum chromite perovskites are considered as anode materials for solid oxide fuel cells with an yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) electrolyte operating in hydrogen at 850 degreesC. The polarization resistance is measured by impedance spectroscopy, and shown to depend significantly on the type and amount of doping.
Titulo: Sr-doped LaCrO3 anode for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In particular, the composition La0.8Sr0.2Cr0.97V0.03O3 (LSCV) is examined in detail.
Titulo: Sr-doped LaCrO3 anode for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Reactivity studies indicate the presence of secondary phases in LSCV.
Titulo: Sr-doped LaCrO3 anode for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: These phases are reactive toward YSZ, resulting in the formation of SrZrO3.
Titulo: Sr-doped LaCrO3 anode for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The secondary phases may be readsorbed during prolonged calcination under reducing conditions.
Titulo: Sr-doped LaCrO3 anode for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The polarization resistance is shown to increase severely over a few days, and to he recoverable by temporary oxidation.
Titulo: Sr-doped LaCrO3 anode for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The time constant of the degradation is shown not to match that of the changes in stoichiometry and conductivity during reduction of the perovskite.
Titulo: Sr-doped LaCrO3 anode for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Two rate limiting processes are generally observed.
Titulo: Sr-doped LaCrO3 anode for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The low frequency process is suggested to relate to adsorption of hydrogen on the LSCV surface or a chemical reaction step.
Titulo: Sr-doped LaCrO3 anode for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The high frequency process is suggested to relate to the LSCV/YSZ contact interface.
Titulo: Sr-doped LaCrO3 anode for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: LSCV does not exhibit significant catalytic activity toward steam reforming of methane, and shows no sign of direct methane oxidation.
Titulo: Sr-doped LaCrO3 anode for solid oxide fuel cells
